item.title: EP 802 - Are Furries Reincarnated Werewolves?
item.itunes:title: Are Furries Reincarnated Werewolves?
item.description:
Today we travel to Brownsville, Texas to spend the night at the cursed Camp Lulu. And then we explore the possibility that furries are reincarnated werewolves!
